segments.text: I observe the scene from this angle in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman stands drying a plate meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet is still running hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's overflowing the sink in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring onto the floor, creating a dangerous puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepped right into it without noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy is on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to grab from the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, tilting precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm up, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view contrasts the indoor tension sharply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone intervenes before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
